title: Designers -- think big!
description: Tim Brown says the design profession has a bigger role to play than just creating nifty, fashionable little objects. He calls for a shift to local, collaborative, participatory "design thinking" -- starting with the example of 19th-century design thinker Isambard Kingdom Brunel.
author: Tim Brown
keywords: TED, talks, art, business, design, green, history, product design, graphic design
